title: IMU President - Clay Mathematics Institute
snippet: Professor Carlos Kenig has been ... of four years beginning 2019. The President oversees all aspects of the IUM and Executive Committee and chairs the Fields Medal Committee....

title: ICM 2022 - International Congress of Mathematicians Virtual Event
snippet: The IMU Executive Committee appointed the ICM 2022 Program Committee (PC) at its meeting in March 2019. The chair of the PC was appointed by the IMU President Carlos E. Kenig, and for the ICM in 2022 it was Martin Hairer of Imperial College, London. The PC decided all speakers at the ICM 2022.

title: IMU-Net 91: September 2018 - International Mathematical Union Newsletter
snippet: Welcome to IMU-Net! I am Carlos Kenig, President elect of the IMU. I would like to introduce myself. I was born and raised in Buenos Aires, Argentina, where I received my early education. I obtained my PhD from the University of Chicago, in 1978. I returned to the University of Chicago as professor ...

title: BCAM collaborator Carlos Kenig new head of the International Mathematical Union (IMU) – BCAM News
snippet: Kenig was appointed president for the period 2019-2022 during the IMU General Assembly in Sao Paolo, Brazil · The International Mathematical Union has elected mathematician Carlos Kenig as its president for the next four years (2019-2022).
